{%- comment -%} @param (string) version Like "1.0", "2.2", or "unreleased". @param (string) label Like "version added", "deprecated in", or "removed in". {%- endcomment -%} {%- assign _old_releases = " v1.0.0 v1.11.0 " -%} {%- assign _full_version = include.version | append: ".0" -%} {%- assign _old_version = _full_version | prepend: "v" -%} {%- if _old_releases contains _old_version -%} {%- assign _full_version = _old_version -%} {%- endif -%} {%- if include.version == "unreleased" -%} not yet released {%- else -%} {{ include.label }}: {{ include.version }} {%- endif -%}
